mapper.sql: id, job_name, job_start, job_end, job_interval, job_status, job_biz_name, job_biz_day, job_version
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_scheduled
id,
job_name,
job_start,
job_end,
job_interval,
job_status,
job_biz_name,
job_biz_day,
job_version,

mapper.update:
update sys_scheduled
job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_start = #{jobStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
job_end = #{jobEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
job_interval = #{jobInterval,jdbcType=BIGINT},
job_status = #{jobStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_biz_name = #{jobBizName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_biz_day = #{jobBizDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_version = #{jobVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_scheduled set job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_start = #{jobStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, job_end = #{jobEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, job_interval = #{jobInterval,jdbcType=BIGINT}, job_status = #{jobStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_biz_name = #{jobBizName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_biz_day = #{jobBizDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_version = #{jobVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_scheduled where job_biz_day = #{reconDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and job_biz_name = #{jobBizName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update sys_scheduled set job_status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,job_version = job_version+1 where job_biz_day = #{reconDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and job_biz_name = #{jobBizName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and job_status = #{oldStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} and job_version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}
